ema sthanawalin soyagath purawasthu, departhamenthuwata labadimata giya awasthawe eewa bharaganima departhamenthuwe niladharin prathikshepa kala athara oonama awasthawaka ema purawasthu bharadimata thamata hakiyawa pawathina bawa ohu kiya sitiyeya.

bohoma sthuthiyi sindu ano...ape kawith rasa windala thawath ee wage kawith idiripath karana ekata...mekath hari lassana githayakne....mama kalin ahala thibuneth na....hamadama me paththeth enna kiyala aaradhana karanawa...apiwa aashraya karanawa kiyala danagaththoth ithin diwos wenna wena ekak na...kawuruth dannawane ithin api oya paththaraya wage neweyi wadagath aya bawa..oya paththaraya ekka asurata gihin bebaddek wenna epa...oya aashraya thamayi mama hithanne diwos ekata aasannama hethuwa....aaye dekak na oon....dakkane...kata ariyoth surawama thamayi....

"ithin eeta passe" teli nirmanaye dedunuge mawage charithayath, "batti" hi angida hamith, "ridi siththam" hi silawathi aantith, age teli natya rangana diwiye prekshaka mathakayan thula sadathanika charithayan ya.

api katha nokara kotuwen pitawena anith dora hoyana giya.
